question: Which of the following were the objectives of Lead Bank scheme?
option1: Eviction of unemployment and under employment.
option2: Survival growth in the living map for the poorest of the poor.
option3: Some basic needs arrangements included in poor sections of the society.
explanation: Objectives of lead bank scheme is to evict unemployment, Survival growth in the living map for the poorest of the poor and to arrange basic needs arrangements included in poor sections of the society.
